name: The Bird's Eye
description:
Play as a cybernetically enhanced soldier in a top-down action RPG set in a techno-futuristic fantasy world. You fight grotesque creatures and powerful automaton as you unfold the mystery of your arrival to this strange place and search for the ultimate artifact - The Bird's Eye.

Please test these out and provide feedback on Patreon, and check out my Twitch stream while you are at it to watch me programming!

https://www.patreon.com/thebirdseyegame

https://www.twitch.tv/amannamednate

We are in the very early stages of development and we are not sure if the game will be fully compatible with all computers

The software on this site is distributed 'as is' and with no warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including and without limitation, any warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

The user (you) must assume the entire risk of using the software.

In no event shall any individual, company or organization involved in any way in the development, sale or distribution of this software be liable for any damages whatsoever relating to the use, misuse, or inability to use this software (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, business interruption, loss of information, or any other loss).'
